titleStmt.title: Rights of the kingdom, or, Customs of our ancestors touching the duty, power, election, or succession of our Kings and Parliaments, our true liberty, due allegiance, three estates, their legislative power, original, judicial, and executive, with the militia freely discussed through the British, Saxon, Norman laws and histories, with an occasional discourse of great changes yet expected in the world.
titleStmt.author: Sadler, John, 1615-1674.

titleStmt.title: Rights of the kingdom, or, Customs of our ancestors touching the duty, power, election, or succession of our Kings and Parliaments, our true liberty, due allegiance, three estates, their legislative power, original, judicial, and executive, with the militia freely discussed through the British, Saxon, Norman laws and histories, with an occasional discourse of great changes yet expected in the world.
titleStmt.author: Sadler, John, 1615-1674.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Duke University Library.
Attributed to John Sadler. cf. NUC pre-1956.
